32  printf("// Starting Fast Cooperative Control Framework \n");

42 void Scheduler::controlloop(){
43  //Get systemtime of framework start [s]
44  ros_time_calibration_=ros::Time::now().toSec();
45  //Set the update loop intervall [1/s]
46  ros::Rate loop_frequency(1/time_intervall_);
47  //Index
48  unsigned i;
49  //Printing loop start screen
50  printf("//---------------------------------------------\n");
51  printf("// Start ROS Control Loop \n");
52 
53 
54  //Starting Agents
55  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
56  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
57  ptr_controller->startAgents();
58  }
59 
60 
61  //Starting fccf loop
62  //--------------------------------------------------------------
63  for(counter_fccfloop_=0;ros::ok();counter_fccfloop_++){
64  //Calculate system time in framework
65  time_framework_=ros::Time::now().toSec()-ros_time_calibration_;
66  //Print time in framework
67  std::cout<<"/*************************************************************************\\"<<std::endl;
68  std::cout<<"/* ";
69  printf("loop: %7i ",counter_fccfloop_);
70  printf("time: %7.4f[s]",time_framework_);
71  std::cout<<" *\\"<<std::endl;
72  std::cout<<"/*************************************************************************\\"<<std::endl;
73 
74  //Check if event happend
75  bool flag_event_happened=false;
76  for(int it_event=0;it_event<eventlist_.size();it_event++){
77  if(eventlist_[it_event]->check(time_framework_)){
78  flag_event_happened=true;
79  }
80  }
81  //Reinit if event happened
82  if(flag_event_happened){
83  flag_event_happened=false;
84  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
85  controllerlist_[it_controller]->init();
86  }
87  }
88  //Control loop
89  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
90  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
91  ptr_controller->getMeasurements();
92  ptr_controller->computeAction(time_framework_);
93  ptr_controller->applyAction();
94  }
95 
96  //Sleep until endtime of loop intervall
97  loop_frequency.sleep();
98  //Run ROS Processes
99  ros::spinOnce();
100  }
101  printf("//**********************************************\n");
102  printf("// Finishing Fast Cooperative Control Framework \n");
103  printf("//**********************************************\n");
104 
105 }
106 void Scheduler::vrepsimrunning(const dentopt_nmpc_controller::VrepInfo& msgInfo){
107  // printf("\n%u\n",msgInfo.simulatorState.data);
108  int info=msgInfo.simulatorState.data;
109  bool old_vrep_flag_stop =vrep_flag_stop_;
110  bool old_vrep_flag_pause=vrep_flag_pause_;
111  //Bit 0 True for simulation not stopped
112  //Bit 1 True for simulation paused
113  vrep_flag_stop_=!(info&0b001);
114  vrep_flag_pause_=(info&0b010);
115  vrep_flag_realtime_=(info&0b100);
116  vrep_time_=msgInfo.simulationTime.data;
117  //printf("Vrep Flag: Stop:%d Pause:%d\n",vrep_flag_stop_,vrep_flag_pause_);
118  if((vrep_flag_stop_)&&(!old_vrep_flag_stop)){
119  printf( "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!\n");
120  printf( "!! vrep stopped !!\n");
121  printf( "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!\n");
122  }
123  if((vrep_flag_pause_)&&(!old_vrep_flag_pause)){
124  printf( "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!\n");
125  printf( "!! vrep paused !!\n");
126  printf( "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!\n");
127  }
128 }
129 void Scheduler::vrepcontrolloop(){
130  //Get Vrep simulation
131  ros::Subscriber rosSubscriberVrepInfo;
132  ros::NodeHandle rosNodeVrepInfo;
133  //Get info about Vrep Simulation
134  rosSubscriberVrepInfo = rosNodeVrepInfo.subscribe(rosNodeVrepInfo.resolveName("vrep/info"),1,&Scheduler::vrepsimrunning,this);
135  //Printing loop start screen
136  printf("//---------------------------------------------\n");
137  printf("// Start VREP Control Loop \n");
138  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep(); //Wait for subscriber
139  ros::spinOnce(); //Check Vrep state
140  //Set the update loop intervall [1/s]
141  ros::Rate loop_frequency(1/time_intervall_);
142  //Index
143  unsigned i;
144 
145 
146 
147  //Starting Agents
148  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
149  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
150  ptr_controller->startAgents();
151  }
152 
153 
154 
155  //Starting fccf loop
156  //--------------------------------------------------------------
157  for(counter_fccfloop_=0;ros::ok();counter_fccfloop_++){
158  //Wait if simulation is stopped
159  while(ros::ok()&&((vrep_flag_stop_==true)||(vrep_flag_pause_==true))){
160  ros::spinOnce();
161  };
162  printf("//---------------------------------------------\n");
163  //Calculate system time in framework
164  time_framework_=vrep_time_;
165  //Print time in framework
166  printf("loop: %7i ",counter_fccfloop_);
167  printf("time: %7.4f\n",time_framework_);
168  double tmp_start=ros::Time::now().toSec();
169 
170  //Check if event happend
171  bool flag_event_happened=false;
172  for(int it_event=0;it_event<eventlist_.size();it_event++){
173  if(eventlist_[it_event]->check(time_framework_)){
174  flag_event_happened=true;
175  }
176  }
177  //Reinit if event happened
178  if(flag_event_happened){
179  flag_event_happened=false;
180  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
181  controllerlist_[it_controller]->init();
182  }
183  }
184 
185  //Control loop
186  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
187  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
188  ptr_controller->getMeasurements();
189  ptr_controller->computeAction(time_framework_);
190  ptr_controller->applyAction();
191  }
192 
193  //Sleep until endtime of loop intervall
194  loop_frequency.sleep();
195  //Run ROS Processes
196  ros::spinOnce();
197  }
198  printf("//**********************************************\n");
199  printf("// Finishing Fast Cooperative Control Framework \n");
200  printf("//**********************************************\n");
201 }

203 void Scheduler::simulationloop(double simtime){
204  //Index
205  unsigned i;
206  //Printing loop start screen
207  printf("//---------------------------------------------\n");
208  printf("// Start SIMULATION Control Loop \n");
209 
210  //Starting Agents
211  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
212  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
213  ptr_controller->startAgents();
214  }
215 
216  time_framework_=0;
217  //Starting fccf loop
218  //--------------------------------------------------------------
219  for(counter_fccfloop_=0;time_framework_<simtime;counter_fccfloop_++){
220  printf("//---------------------------------------------\n");
221  //Print time in framework
222  printf("loop: %7i ",counter_fccfloop_);
223  printf("time: %7.4f\n",time_framework_);
224 
225  //Check if event happend
226  bool flag_event_happened=false;
227  for(int it_event=0;it_event<eventlist_.size();it_event++){
228  if(eventlist_[it_event]->check(time_framework_)){
229  flag_event_happened=true;
230  }
231  }
232  //Reinit if event happened
233  if(flag_event_happened){
234  flag_event_happened=false;
235  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
236  controllerlist_[it_controller]->init();
237  }
238  }
239  //Control loop
240  for(int it_controller=0;it_controller<controllerlist_.size();it_controller++){
241  ptr_controller=controllerlist_[it_controller];
242  ptr_controller->computeAction(time_framework_);
243  ptr_controller->applyAction();
244  ptr_controller->integrateStateExplicitEuler(time_framework_,time_intervall_);
245  }
246 
247  time_framework_+=time_intervall_;
248  }
249  printf("//***********************************************\n");
250  printf("// Finishing Fast Cooperative Control Simulation \n");
251  printf("//***********************************************\n");
252 }
